item.description: I'm sorry it has taken so long to post this. I have had a severe allergic reaction for almost 2 weeks. I hope some folks managed to see David Lindahl in Dedham. We'd like to hear your impressions. I have been processing a "Short Sale" this past month with a great deal of help form my friend Derek Ebrecht. I will speak about it and answer any ?s that come up. I dont' expect it to be a very high attendance, so you may get a chance to bring up a ? or 2 that you need answered. I'll see you there. dale
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club August Meetup
